name: Testing
body:
### Welcome to Testing page.
This is automating what you wast time in when you install Ubuntu from the beginning or even re-install it or upgrade it ...
Simply we are trying to make the life easier with zero risk. 

### Authors and Contributors
This tool designed and programmed by Hazem Hemied
```ruby
     def greeting(name)
       puts "Hi, and welcome #{name}"
     end
```

### Support or Contact
You can support me by using the tool and give me your feed back @testgit88.
Having trouble with Pages? just please keep in touch and I will be glade to hear from you at <testgit2@gmail.com/>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
